152.content:
November, Sheba, Ancient Middle East
- ---- - - --- --- -- --- --- ---- --- ---- ----

Deep in the heart of the Middle East, past the rising sand dunes and caravans of camels, towered a mighty palace that was swathed by gold, jewellery and all manner of riches. This was the mighty Palace of Sheba, home to the beautiful Queen of Sheba who resided inside.

Inside she lounged on her horizontal throne, laying placidly as hordes of men (and women) tended to her needs such as fanning her, feeding her grapes and whatnot while complimenting her on her beauty.

In her aesthetic appearance, Queen Nahira could not be faulted; she had dark, raven hair that flowed elegantly in a long ponytail down one of her shoulders. She had tanned chestnut skin from lying idly in the sun and had charming emerald eyes which sparkles like twinkling stars. Her body, lithe, nimble and supple, was enchanting with curves in the right place and a large DD rack to go along with them.

Although she had the body of a stunning 25 year old woman, the Queen was 168, nearing 200 and the people of Sheba suspected that she had been using dark, supernatural magic to keep herself young that had been forbidden to the people from centuries.

As the Queen opened her maw to gobble up another handful of grapes, the door to her throne room was flung open and standing bravely in the doorway was her former general, Ibrahim the Valiant. Behind him were an assortment of warriors who seemed jittery and anxious in the presence of the Queen.

"Ah, Ibrahim, my formerly loyal lieutenant," the Queen spoke as she clicked her fingers to tell her servants that they could dismiss themselves. She slowly stood up and walked to a bowl of water that was on the ground a few steps away. "Are you parched? It is a long trek from the valley to the Palace, my friend."

She offered up the bowl to him but he slapped it away. "Do not make this harder than it needs to be, Your Highness. You know that I did not come here for pleasure."

"Tsk, so rude! Always coming with the stern, emotionless exterior," she replied, employing a suspiciously sultry voice and laying a soft hand on his torso. "I can read you, my dear Ibrahim- you and I both know there is ALWAYS time for a little pleasure..."

He shrugged her off violently prompting her to do a mock shock face. "You, Queen Nahira of Sheba, have been deemed unfit to rule by me and several other village chiefs. Effective immediately, you are disposed from the Throne and you are going to be held accountable for your crimes of the use of forbidden magic, murder and unlawfully taking subjects as slaves."

Queen Nahira's sarcastic look of shock slowly transformed into one of pure, unbridled rage. "You DARE dispose of ME! I am your QUEEN! You must bow DOWN to ME, you INSOLENT WORM!" As she defiantly retorted she poked a finger into his chest to place extra emphasis on each word.

"Please, stand down. We sensed you were going to fight this so we employed the Sheban army if you try anything."

Her anger seemed to melt away as she let out a malevolent cackle. "My own army, betraying me. I guess I'll just stand down and..." Suddenly, she turned and
shot out her arms towards Ibrahim the Valiant and whispered a few words in an indecipherable tongue. He coughed and fell to his knees as he felt something inside himself changing. He felt his strength ebbing away as his muscles diminished under his armour. His hair grew until it was long and brown and snaked down his back. His face slimmed and his lips grew bigger and he screamed girlishly as he felt his body getting older and wrinklier. Now where once stood Ibrahim the Valiant, a strong Sheban soldier, was a withered elderly lady donning battle armour that swamped her frail frame.

"Ah, that was... SCRUMPTIOUS!" The army turned to see Queen Nahira in her newest form: she looks about 5 years younger with larger (but not huge) muscles on her fit physique. She'd grown about 5 inches, from 5'2" to 5'7" and looked like she could take on the army singlehanded. She cackled yet again as she flexed her newly acquired muscles. "I needed a good feast and I've got to say Ib, you've really sated my hunger! I could last another few decades with the meal you gave me! Getting it from you especially- mhmm, that's the best part about it!"

The army stood gaping at the scene in front of them: their ferocious, (formerly) awe-inspiring leader had been reduced to an elderly lady by the Queen who now possessed his (former) strength and she looked eager to use it.

"W-wait!" Ibrahim piped up, struggling to rise from his seated position. "Y-you didn't think that was our o-only plan?" As he finally rose he opened his palm and revealed a vibrant orange stone which glowed brightly. "Be gone foul witch!"

An orange portal opened behind her, growing larger each second. Although it seemed to not affect Ibrahim or any of the soldiers, Queen Nahora felt the vortex tugging at her. Although she had improved strength, it proved not to be enough as she was quickly sucked inside and left with a squeaky pop.

"*Pant*. *Pant*. I-I need to lie down," said Ibrahim as he collapsed on the cold, hard ground.

7:30am
-- --- -- - --- -- - --- - - ---

It was a normal day for this small town, a few cars whizzing by and the birds chirping their sweet melodies. Frank had just began his daily shift of taking the trash and stuffing it into his garbage truck- it may not have been the most glamorous of jobs but it was good pay for such an easy workload. He just sometimes wished something more exciting happened instead of the same old day repeating endlessly.

He got more than he bargained when an orange portal opened above his head. The suction of it whipped off his hat and swallowing it whole and in return spitting out a young woman who crashed violently onto the trash bags. She was absolutely stunning, dark flowing hair with a beautifully sculpted body. The woman was swathed in purple and red garments with extravagant golden rings, necklaces, a bedazzled belt with a matching diamond plated headpiece.

Frank scratched his head as he looked down on her form. The woman didn't seem to move- why would she? She'd fallen 20 feet with only broken bottles and food cartridges to break her fall. "How am I gonna explain this one to the Boss," he grumbled. As he bent to pick up her limp body, her eyes snapped open, causing Frank to stumble back and fall onto his back. She slowly stood up, stretching her body out as if falling from such a height was just a normal occurrence. The body was CLEARLY not lifeless and seemed to be unaffected by the near-death experience. This freaked Frank out and he rapidly sprung up (something that he would have thought abnormal for his 54 years) and clambered into his garbage truck, accelerating away and hitting a few cars in the process.

- - -- ----- - - ----- --- -- --- -- --- -- --- -- -- ---- ---

Standing outside a small coffee shop opposite the street, Reggie Dickson watched the commotion. He was trying to look casual but it was pretty hard to when you were a big 6'2" black dude. He hesitantly looked round- no one in the area except for him and the woman. He was only up this early because he had to commit a crime to prove himself to a local gang, the Parkside Posse. He tensely felt the outline of the gun in his hoodie pocket as he anxiously pondered whether he would need it.

Identifying the woman as his target, he broke away from the shop and ambled towards her. As he walked closer he heard her mutter, "Curse you, Ibrahim, you wretched, backstabbing traitor!" Taking a deep breath, he pulled the drawstrings of his hood tight and pulled out the gun. "HEY!" The woman swivelled round, looking irked that she'd been disturbed from her little rant. He raised the barrel of the pistol up to her face with a trembling hand. "Don't try any funny business! Just... Give the money!"

The woman craned her head, seeming to be more bewildered than scared. She reached out to paw at the pistol which caused Reggie to retreat slightly. "What manner of sorcery IS that?" the woman asked inquisitively. "What? No, stop distracting me! Just hurry up and give the freaking money!" Reggie retorted as he grabbed her shoulder.

The woman looked on his milk-chocolate coloured hand as if it was a poisonous spider. "You DARE touch Queen Nahira of Sheba, you insolent thug! For this, you shall PAY!" She smacked away his arm with a surprising amount of strength and mumbled something imperceptible to the ear. Reggie felt something weird happening to his body, spreading from the soles of his feet to the crown of his head. He dropped the gun to the ground as he screamed, "AARRGGHH!!"

First he heard his hoodie rip, the hood slowly drifting to the floor as the jacket now came to just below the tip of his petite shoulders. The black fabric ripped again as a large boob window opened, exposing Reggie's juicy new rack to the world.

His coal-black trousers began to hug his new form a bit tighter as they shortened and fused with the dark material of his jacket, forming a tight bodycon mini dress that embraced his curvaceous bod. From henceforth, you will obey my EVERY command UNCONDITIONALLY and it doesn't faze me if you cry and wail- your objections are irrelevant and frankly you BEGGING me to convert you to your normal form will be entertaining! Understand?"

"...there's a shopping mall a couple dozen miles down the road, your Higness. You can find a variety of clothing choices that 'best reflect your INFINITE beauty'." The sarcasm dripped off Reggie's tongue like snake venom but it seemed to have no effect on the evil python called Queen Nahira.

"Thank you, my faithful subject, let us be on our way."

"The only problem, my Queen," he retorted sardonically, "is that we don't have any way to actually GET THERE. We could walk but I doubt that is 'suitable for your Majesty!" He laughed as Queen Nahira's face started to redden, showing either extreme embarrassment, annoyance or rage.

Queen Nahira suddenly whipped her head round and scowled menacingly at Reggie, silencing his laughter. "I wouldn't laugh at me, peasant," she said in a terrifyingly calm voice while prodding a dainty finger into his chest. "I, Nahira, Queen of Sheba, am the ONLY person, alive or dead, that can transform you back to your original form, you lowlife, degenerate THIEF. If I were you, I would not, as the old saying goes, Bite the Hand That feeds you."

She removed her finger from Reggie's torso and as she did so he exhaled a sigh of relief. When she prodded her index into his chest she had placed it strategically onto his heart, somehow making it feel like it had temporarily stopped. 'Damn, Reg, what kinda crap are you into this time?' he silently asked himself.

At that moment, the sound of a car trundling past caught the attention of Nahira eliciting a sly grin as she concocted a plan. Lifting the train of her garment, she slowly sauntered into the street. "Hey, hey, HEY! What are you DOING! Are you trying to get KILLED!" Reggie yelled from the pavement.

Nahira sighed and craned her neck towards him. "I am FLATTERED you worry for my safety but there is no need for alarm. I've done the same thing THOUSANDS of times at the Great Bazaars of Istanbul! Your time's mechanical carts do not scare me!"

Reggie looked on apprehensively. 'Why am I even giving two craps to this cow? Reggie thought intensely. 'SHE did this to me! SHE gave me this busty bimbo bod! Even though he still harboured his anger, Reggie couldn't stop thinking about what Nahira had said before, about her being the only person who could change him back. 'BS! She's just bluffing so that she can make me believe she has power over me! It's not gonna work!' He tried to persuade himself but something inside of him knew that it wasn't true.

Both Reggie standing on the side and Queen Nahira standing determinedly in the street with a palm raised saw the tye dye caravan swerve round a corner and then careen down the road. Both temporarily thought that the plan would work and the ban would stop for them. Both felt fine slow down as they saw the driver's alarmed expression and saw him try and turn the steering wheel agonisingly slowly, too late to change the course that would send him ploughing straight through a formerly proud and brazen Queen who now cowered when she realised she was facing her imminent demise.

Luckily for the both of them, one reacted quickly, tackling the woman out of the way with their large bust while the driver completed his swerve and crashed loudly into some overturned wheelie bins.

Queen Nahira slowly peeled open her eyelids, exposing them to the sunshine raining down on.... "SUNSHINE!" she exclaimed. She sat up and patted herself down. "I'M ALIVE!" She tried to stand but felt a dead weight on her legs. "Urgh, get off me, you useless flunky!" She shoved him off as she stood up and stretched out her aching legs.

"So... No... Thanks... AT ALL!" Reggie breathed heavily as he struggled to regain his breath. "I... I just... SAVED your... UNGRATEFUL ASS!"

"Please," Queen Nahira spoke as she looked down upon her transformed servant. "... a servant would do ANYTHING for their master ANYWAYS, not excluding DYING for them, so I do not see why this situation is different from any normal scenario."

Reggie pondered swinging and punching Nahira but decided against it. "Let's just go and get your stuff then you're changing me back," he said as he composed himself to which Queen Nahira nodded.

"DUUUDES!" Reggie and Nahira turned to look at the driver of the car running towards them along with a woman Reggie assumed was his girlfriend. He looked like he was a hippie straight from the 1960s with tiny, circular shades, long blonde hair, a tye-dye combo of a bandana and shirt, ripped navy blue jeans and some ugly brown loafers. The most memorable thing about him was that his face looked exactly like a chipmunk's with the thin face and the swollen cheek pouches.

"Like, I am TOTALLY sorry about that, dudettes. We were just riding the free country roads, feeling the wind run through our hair, when BOOM! We hit a turn at 50 and nearly flattened you. Are you okay, dudette?"

In one swift move before anyone else could react, Nahira grabbed his collar, plucked him off the ground and slammed him into the concrete wall of a nearby house. "First off, don't EVER call me 'DUDETTE' again." Her voice started even but began to rise as she reminded herself of her close brush with death. "Second, you nearly killed me you idiotic twerp! I should VAPORISE you to DUST right now but I believe that death would be too easy for you; instead, since you obviously have the brain of a rodent, you deserve to completely BECOME ONE.”

The man felt a tingle like an electric current flow through his body, starting from the soles of his feet to the crown of his head. He helped as he looked down and saw golden hair-no, fur- sprout from his knuckles and spread down his arm. Next, he felt his toes shrinking as they became smaller and smaller, his big toe on each foot disappearing back into his legs. He shrunk immensely, losing feet by the second until he was the average size of about a squirrel. The golden fur covered every inch of his body now, blotting out every patch of pale skin. His face rounded, becoming more chipmunk-like as his jaw reshaped to give him more space to store food.

At the end of the transformation there was just a small chipmunk in the pile of clothes left on the floor as reminders of the man it used to be. It scampered onto the man's girlfriend's shoulder, chittering as the girl (who couldn't have been more than 19) quaked in her rainbow flip flops.

"Would you like to suffer the same fate, girl?" Nahira questioned. The woman vehemently shook her head which made Nahira smile. "Good, then..."

1533.content:
Barry knew that he couldn't really call his resting place a home. It was just a small caravan parked in a dodgy alleyway near to the local skip. It was covered in mould, fungus and had some 'questionable' odours but in his mind he knew that the old relic had character. Plus it was the only place he could afford to sleep in.

Life had been rough- he thought he'd met the love of his life and thought that they had an everlasting relationship. After bitter arguments, cheating and terrible decisions from both sides, they had split up and Barry was exiled from his own home and banned for a few years from seeing his own children. He'd tried to bounce back by bringing back his band, the Ruff' Riders back but they'd been told they were 'too retro for the new times'.

To make matters worse his ex-wife married a gun toting brickhead commando who hated Barry even more than she did. He'd also done a LOT of bad investments that had quickly gone south; who would have thought no one would want to buy squirrel powered motorised tricycles?

Anyway, he'd slipped into a dark period, turning to alcohol and drugs to keep him going, losing his treasured physique that he'd cherished in his younger years.

This specific day had started off badly for Barry. He'd been rejected at an interview as they realised that he was intoxicated for the whole time and hadn't been sober for many weeks. On the way back his car had been taken away by the police as they realised he was DUI. He's had to walk past some shifty neighbourhoods as he made his way back to his 'home'.

He could hardly contain himself as he sped into the shelter of his caravan. He swiped old cartridges of Chinese takeaway and fried chicken boxes as he placed the cylinder on his table. "This could be it!" he said loudly to himself, unable to control his excitement. "All these years... I've been waiting for a break like this for so long and it's finally here..."

He shook the object and turned it over in his hands. 'What the hell is it?" As soon as he saw the strange symbols, he knew he could make some big cash by selling it off to a museum or a private buyer. "They'll all be lining around the block trying to get their hands on this," he chuckled to himself as he imagined riches in his head. "Just as soon as I find out what it does..."

Getting frustrated by the object, Barry vehemently threw it to the ground, causing...

Although he didn't know what transmogrification meant, Barry knew that if some kind of alien artifact used a big sciencey word it probably meant BAD NEWS. He tried groping around trying to find the cylinder but the search was unfruitful. "COMMENCE PROCEDURE IN 5...4..."

"Oh God, oh God!" Barry panicked as the voice counted down. He miraculously reached the caravan door but when he tried to open it it refused to open. "3...2..." Now he just resorted to screaming and shouting. "HELP! HELP ME!"

"...1...0. ENJOY THE RESULTS!" The first thing Barry realised had changed was his voice. As he was screaming his Adam's apple was sucked back into his neck as his vocal chords changed, going higher in pitch and sounding more feminine.

"What...The...Hell!" Barry squealed. He grabbed his throat with his hands, unaware that they were rapidly becoming smaller and daintier with every passing second. "AUGGH!" Barry collapsed to the ground as an overwhelming pain racked his body. He felt his bones cracking and shifting as his form changed; his legs and arms lost their fat as they became lean and limber, his spine straightened out as he lost his slouch and gained a regal, ladylike posture. Somehow Barry stood up and stumbled out of the door and laid himself down outside of the van. Now, unconscious and sprawled outside in his oversized clothes, Barry was helpless and confused in a foreign body.

153311.content:
"Arise...arise sleeping maiden..." Barry slowly parted his eyelids, attempting not to cringe at the onslaught of light that pierced through.He felt hard, rough timber beneath his torso and felt a cold gust of wind that made his body shiver from head to toe. Still groggy, he tried to prop up his elbows and heave himself from the floor to observe his surroundings.

He was correct in assuming that he was sitting on timber; the whole room he was in was a delapadated oak structure with frail columns and holes where termites had cheek through. It seemed that no one had lived in this house for a while now as it seemed run down and uncared for. There was an overwhelming stench that crawled through Barry's nose that compelled him to gag. He saw a rickety old table near to him and shuffled to it, looking for a means to lever himself upwards. After a quick struggle to squirm over to the table, Barry placed a hand on the table to steady himself- a dainty, manicured hand that seemed completely alien to him.

"SQUEAL!" Barry yelped as he snatched his hand away and searched for the knuckle hair that he had grown accustomed to. He frantically moved his hands across his body, shifting his focus from his hands to his new curves and muscular limbs to his silky, raven mane. 'It wasn't a dream...' he silently sobbed as he realised he really HAD been transformed into a woman. 'How the hell did this happen? I was just messing with that... I need to find out what's going on.'

He once again reached for the table and heaved himself up. He momentarily suffered vertigo as he stood up as he slowly got his bearings. He tried to walk forward but tripped a loose floorboard and slammed straight back to the ground, slap bang onto his gelatinous breasts. 'Nearly forgot about my new attachments,'he thought to himself,'I've got to get used to these new throw pillows.' He stopped for a second to poke one then reminded himself that he had a job to do.

After rising a third time, Barry had grown semi-comfortable of his new form, walking a bit more staable than his last two trips. The only thing that annoyed him was that he seemed to have naturally developed a feminine strut that he had to forcibly correct himself not to do. Suddenly Barry smelt something coming from a room that was presumably the kitchen, an enticing aroma that led him to investigate.

Ripping a loose plank from a crumbling wall, Barry traced the scent, slowly tiptoeing towards the door opening. '3,2,1!' He kicked the door open, makeshift weapon brandished only to find...
153311.title: Someone finds him

1533112.content:
... an elderly couple standing behind a stove, nonchalantly cooking. Barry looked towards the man who was wearing brown, corduroy slacks with chestnut coloured loafers. He looked even older as he wore a muted green checkerboard woollen sweater over a casual white dress shirt and a small beige cap atop his crown. His skin was pale and his eyes, although they were deep inside of his sunken eye sockets, radiated life, vibrant and green.

His partner also dressed conservatively, wearing a matching green jumper and shirt while instead of slacks she wore a plain grey skirt. She had high socks which covered her knobbled knees and flats that didn't increase her height of 5'1". She had short silvery hair that was pushed behind her ears, allowing Barry to see the abundance of wrinkles on her withered face.

Barry watched on pensively as he weighed up his options; either try and take out the couple for a possible kidnapping, which could potentially blow up in his face if they'd just picked him up and brought him to the shack after his 'transmogrification', or try to slowly sneak out a bit quieter than when he came in.

He quickly chose option 2 (did you really think he was gonna beat up some elderly people?), choosing to slowly back out of the door instead.

"Come back!" He heard the same voice that had woken him up but this was different; the words seemed to resonate in his mind, bouncing around his skull, penetrating his mental defences and forcing him to yield to them. Barry felt his body go slack as he lost control of it. His legs started moving involuntarily towards the source of the voice. He tried to scream aloud for help but his mouth couldn't seem to conjure any noise.

As he walked back into the room, Barry realised that there was someone else with him also and that they'd been obstructed by a wooden support beam in front of him. They slowly spun around and observed Barry as he strutted inside, surveying his new body from head to toe as if he was a frog about to be dissected by a scientist.

As he approached the figure, Barry looked them up and down. A woman, no more than 23, who possessed flawless hazelnut skin and crimped ebony hair with perfect curls running down to her shoulders, one side covering an eye. Her eyes themselves were a deep silvery, hazel fusion which if you stared into, you could lose yourself in them. She had full, maroon-coloured lips that were pursed together in an unintended scowl. Her clothes seemed 2nd rate compared to her model appearance : a dirty set of clothes which consisted of a denim jacket, a grey t-shirt with a pair of ripped jeans and a worn out pair of Converse Allstars.

He felt his new body moved towards the woman,trying unsuccessfully to regain control of his limbs. He now stood in front of the woman and bowed in front of her. "How may I serve you, my mistress?", he heard himself say in a feminine sing-song voice that made him feel sick. First he couldn't control his own movements and now he was forced to call this stranger his MISTRESS! He struggled even more vehemently now in his own mind to regain control.

The woman, or whatever she was, giggled as she stood up from the seat she was in and paced over to Barry's sullen form with his head bowed on the floor. "Rise, servant!" As Barry stood up, he...
1533112.title: ...a 60 year old couple with a young woman

choices: The family enters the ghost train.
1542.content:
The only member of Danny's family not present on this day out was his step-father Kevin, which was fine with Danny, since he and Megan didn't get along with him, unlike his two biological children. However, Danny did get along okay with his half sister Kourtney and half sister Kurt, and they were with the family, along with his girlfriend Michelle, aged 22, who was an attractive blonde three years Kurt's senior.

"You want to go on the ghost train Danny?" Kourtney nudged her step-brother, smirking as she did so.

"Uh, yeah, why not. You coming Megs?" Danny then asked his sister Megan.

Megan shook her distinctive head, with it's fauxhawx. "I want a quick go on the roller coaster first." She smirked, knowing Danny had a fear for roller coasters. "You want to come with? I'll hold your hand." She laughed.

"Don't tease your brother Megan." Danny's mom, Gabrielle smiled at her kids, following behind them.

"Not teasing mom, just trying to get him over his fear of things." Megan defended herself, as she looked around. There were a lot of people at the fairground, an awful lot, and they were quite a mixture. Something there wasn't though... was old people. Megan couldn't see anyone passed the age of 50-ish. Which was to be expected in a fairground.

"I'll get over what I want to." Danny said, frowning at his sister. "In my own time."

Skip to Rosa in the bathroom
15511.content:
- - -
“...And over here we have our exhibits on Ancient Egypt...” A young woman wearing plain clothes and a lanyard saying ‘Chloe’ waltzed through the halls with all the workers of Transforming Genetics in tow.

Richie Kendrick plunged his hand into his knapsack and pulled out a camera which he then used to photograph enthusiastically, trying to capture every monument on display.

“Calm down Richie,” Rosa laughed as she placed a hand on his shoulders. “Getting a bit TOO excited, don’t you think?” He lowered his camera and blushed a bit. “Sorry, it’s just so FASCINATING! I mean, a civilisation that was founded THOUSANDS of years ago, with architecture and designs that were CENTURIES ahead of their time, its UNFATHOMABLE...”

Rosa nodded as he continued to speak; once ol’ Rich started ranting he would NEVER stop. She flicked her hair from her shoulder and straightened her personalised spectacles as she looked around at her colleagues.

Many (like Rosa herself) weren’t really interested in the tour and were just ambling around and stopping every few minutes to study something that piqued their interest. She found herself looking at different pairings and casually observing them.

She first found herself looking over at Trent Lockheed, your stereotypical douchebag. He thought he was God’s gift to women with his rugged good looks and tousled blonde hair. Even though it was winter you wouldn’t have been able to tell it as he wore shades, a tight fitted short sleeved top and ripped jeans, the poor man’s Johnny Bravo (respect to anyone that understands that). He turned and saw Rosa looking at him and growled while shooting finger guns at her.

“Ugh...” She rolled her eyes at his machismo, mouthing, ’I’ve got a boyfriend’. Accompanying Trent, as usual, was his pseudo girlfriend, Rachel Cartwright. She wore her usual attire: a baggy Fila hoodie with worn out blue jeans and trainers as she stood behind Trent, laughing a BIT too had at his jokes. Rosa could never quite understand why or how she was attracted to him; while Rachel was quiet and down-to-earth, Trent was the exact opposite, being boastful and arrogant.

’Well, you know what they say: opposites attract.’ Rosa changed her focus to the other pairs. One was Jake and Jenny, the inseparable duo. For the year and a bit that Rosa had worked under Dr Lockheed she’d NEVER seen them separated. They could always include others but no one ever really infiltrated the inner circle. They both wore the matching twin outfits: same baggy green jacket, same Star Wars T-shirts, jeans and unbranded shoes. The only difference was in the way they carried themselves; Jake always seemed the confident sibling, pushing his chest out and pointing stuff out. Jenny was more shy, no, introverted than her twin brother, content to just smile and nod as Jake rambled on and on about something he’d seen.

Rosa craned her head to observe more of her coworkers when suddenly she felt a rumble in her stomach. ’Ugh, it’s back...’ She grabbed her stomach and apologised to Richie as she ran off, searching frantically for a bathroom so she could, ‘take care of business’.

Focus on another group staying at IDL
155131.content:
Deep in the heart of the Bermuda Triangle stands a small tropical isle that is undetectable by radar and other means unless you receive a premium invitation that tells you its specific location. People of all walks come here: young, old, male, female, bachelors, couples and even families.

They all come to this hospitable paradise hoping to alleviate themselves of their stresses back home, seeking to relax and change their lives for the better. Unfortunately for them, one eccentric millionaire by the name of Doctor Reginald Lockheed takes this all too literally, seeking to use the holiday resort to perform his experiments on unsuspecting victims.

As this is a brand new venue, there's bound to be a few more characters that are present (I've got a new idea: I'll add some characters now but if you want to add your own, send a message to me and I will try and add them to this chapter! 😁)

Drake Adderley: 22 year old lifeguard at IDL (Isla-de-Lockheed). 6'0" and well built with quiffed brown hair, tanned skin as well as large muscles(and a large package) from surfing and volleyball. Can normally be seen in standard turquoise IDL tank top with shorts and flip flops with a shark tooth necklace round his neck. Easy going and friendly, he attracts a large amount of female- and male- suitors but he is not ready for commitment. Is both a frien and rival to fellow lifeguard Carter and they always try to compete with themselves. Has a never ending on-again-off-again relationship with coworker Anne-Marie (they've been caught behaving 'inappropriately' at work multiple times, either making out or having a massive argument).

Mallory Hollis: 24 year old lifeguard at IDL. She's a 5'9" bombshell, possessing; hypnotic turquoise eyes, long brunette hair, tanned perfect skin and D cup boobs. She's in good shape as she runs regularly alongside playing other beach sports. She's bisexual and like Drake has no intentions to settle down.

Minnie Gorham: 20 year old receptionist at the front desk. Hailing from London, Minnie is a distant niece of Dr Lockheed's. While not being much in the looks department except from a cute geeky look with dorky glasses and a petite 5'0" figure owning small B cup breasts, she is very intelligent and sometimes aids Dr Lockheed in his experiments, whether helping with surgery or choosing victims.

Denise Philpott: 31 year old bartender and waitress. She works at The Cabana, a bar and restaurant outside by the pools. She's a busty 5'5" African American woman who values her possessions a lot. Wears her dark hair into a bun, makeup and fake nails, an Isla de Lockheed shirt and apron accompanied by short jeans shorts and 3 inch heels. Has a 12 year old son called Renford who hardly speaks.

Felicity 'Foggo' Jenkins: 25 year old Caucasian waitress at The Cabana. A proud oddball, the 5'4" girl puts her multicoloured hair (at the current moment in time orange and green) into twin pigtails at the side of her head and tops it with a bow. Has a few ear piercings, a small nose piercing and a tongue piercing to boot. Above average figure- slim with small A cup boobs. Crazy and hyperactive, she can be a great friend if you don't kill her first for being annoying, seen by the fact she's become close companions with the seamstress Anne-Marie Musson.

Carter Woods Jr: 23 year old lifeguard. As a 5'10" lightskin dude with a Hollywood quality jawline, he's the only guy at the resort that attracts more attention than his fellow lifeguard Drake. With a chiseled six-pack and a former career in modelling, he breaks the hearts of many when he reveals that he's already gotten a serious girlfriend (Heather Tuzo).

Heather Tuzo: 21 year old concierge at IDL. Mixed race (half black, half Asian) beauty standing at 5'6". Has modest sized C cup breasts but owns a plump butt that distracts many of the men she meets. Normally holds her frizzy chestnut hair back with a hairband while wearing a turquoise IDL shirt with a sleeveless jeans jacket, leggings and comfortable trainers. In a serious relationship with lifeguard Carter Woods Jr and sister of bellhop Francis Tuzo.

Francis Tuzo: 26 year old bellhop. Possessing a large 6'2" frame, Francis both takes heavy bags from clients and acts as a security guard when there are altercations in the hotel. Not very intelligent, Francis is a loyal lackey of Dr Lockheed.

Anne-Marie Musson: 24 year old seamstress and boutique manager at Isla de Lockheed Resort. 5'7" with straightened, shoulder length blonde hair, Anne-Marie comes from a fashion school in Belgium where she learnt to make nearly any article of clothing at record time. Coming to IDL for both money and a permanent vacation, she is in charge of creating any clothes or modifications that Dr Lockheed requires. Wears a bedazzled IDL spaghetti top, sunglasses on top of her head everywhere, a bedazzled leather jacket with booty shorts and ankle boots. Friends with Foggo Jenkins and has an on-again-off-again relationship with lifeguard Drake Adderley. She has a very passionate personality and so is deliriously in love when they are dating and violent and temperamental when they're not.

Frederick Johansson: 26 year old handyman at IDL. An unfortunate victim of Dr Reginald Lockheed's experiments, he's been swapped with the 27 year old cook Adele 'Deli' Agard, now having an attractive feminine form that's 5'6" with braided ginger hair pulled into a high ponytail and C cup breasts. As many of Lockheed's subjects are, he's oblivious to his change and behaves very masculine despite his appearance.

Adele 'Deli' Agard: 27 year old cook at IDL. Has unfortunately had her body swapped with handyman Frederick Johansson to which she is blissfully unaware. As a very flamboyant French girl, she acts effeminately and attracts attention in her new 5'8" Norwegian body. When not in standard IDL cook uniform, she wears feminine clothes and makeup.
155131.title: Isla-de-Lockheed

choices: Someone makes their own way around
1551311.content:
As the plane slowly trickled to a halt a female voice boomed over the tannoy, "WELCOME TO ISLA DE LOCKHEED, THE ONLY RESORT THAT PROMISES PERMANENT LIFE CHANGING EXPERIENCES TO ALL OF ITS RESIDENTS! PLEASE EXIT THE AIRCRAFT, MAKING SURE..."

Danny slowly unfurled his stiff body from his seat. He'd always hated flights, the uncomfortable chairs and seemingly infinite boredom that he experienced only amplified by a long 7 hour journey. He scratched both an itch in his messy black hair and one on his crotch as he stood up and grabbed his coal-black rucksack.

He looked to the seat beside him to see his 22 year old sister Megan snoring like a sleep-depraved bison. Danny looked at his sleeping sibling, laughing silently at the innocent baby faced look she wore that contrasted with the dark, heavy metal persona she tried to show off. He considered waking her up from her slumber before he reminded herself of his sister's consistent propensity of lashing out at people who disturbed her rest.

Instead he stepped out of the aircraft, shielding his eyes from the bright glare of the sun reflecting off of the pristine white sand. As he walked down the stairs, he spotted his mother looking around the crowd of people that had also flooded out from the plane. He made an attempt to go over to her when she suddenly spotted someone in the crowd and ran over, jumping in their arms and planting a wet kiss on their lips. "Ugh..." Danny groaned as he realised who it was.

Cradling his mother in his tree trunks of arms was unfortunately Danny's stepfather, Kevin. He had never been seen in a positive light by Danny or his sister Megan for attempting to replace their biological father. Eventually Kevin had stopped trying to play nice with them both, only pretending to like them when his wife, Gabby, was around.

Following closely behind Kevin where his two children, Kurt and Kourtney. Although they were technically half-siblings to Danny as they had the same mother, Danny had always struggled to accept them as family even after sharing the same roof with them for basically his whole life. While Kurt was very down to Earth and easy to get along with, Kourtney was a massive b-word, turning her nose up at most people and practically shunning people she thought were below her.

His inner dispute on joining them or not was disrupted by a loud feedback noise that flared up and left everyone clutching at their ears. A tall, elderly man walked towards the front of the crowd, holding a cane in one hand and a megaphone in the other. "Sorry," he spoke with the megaphone held up to his mouth. "Haven't used one of these before... Umm... Bear with me..."

The man lowered the megaphone, inspecting it and banging it a few times to make it work. The onlookers were watching on in startled confusion, wondering who the heck this old kook was. After a few more awkward moments the man regained his composure.

"Hello and welcome to Isla de Lockheed Holiday Resort. My name is Dr Reginald Lockheed. You may know me as a world renowned authority on genetics and human anatomy, devoting my time to discover new ways to improve the quality of human life and such. But enough about my me. Now, once I started researching and investigating innovative solutions for life, I realised one main problem of humanity is our constant struggle to work hard and become successful."

"While I must commend those of you that work tirelessly to provide for themselves and their families, I have to tell you now that by living this way you are drastically increasing your stress and therefore increasing your likelihood of strokes and other health issues."

"This is why I created this Resort; this 'safe haven' ,if you wish, far away from the stress and demands of the workplace. Please, come and relax, your luggage has already been collected and arranged immaculately in your assigned rooms by our staff. Come with me and I PROMISE that you WON'T leave this place the same..." As he spoke this last sentence the corners of his mouth stretched upwards into a creepy, self-aware grin. 'Oh yes... Dr Lockheed thought to himself, 'NONE of them will be the same..."
1551311.title: The workers at TG and their families check in t...

choices: Go with another group of TG workers
15513111.content:
“Coming up on your left is the first-class sauna and spa facility that was kindly purchased by the exceptionally kind Professor Lockheed...” Heather, the group’s guide, gestured towards the impressive structure as all the onlookers oohed and ahhed behind her. As she directed the large horde of people she wore an infectious, genuine smile. Professor Lockheed smiled from the rear of the crowd; he hadn't even needed to alter her in any way, her cheery disposition was all natural. He quietly slipped away from the bulk of the group just as they stepped outside to see the pristine country club constructed there with luscious green fields and trimmed hills.

Danny groaned- the constant clicking of camera shutter sound effects was starting to get on his nerves. He turned towards Megan to lament about it but harrumphed when he saw bulky headphones jammed onto her ears. Judging by the hellish way her face was contorted and the way she fiddled with her black nail polished fingers, she was ‘studying’ one of her rock songs again. Trying to get her attention while she was locked in like this was plain suicidal so Danny dared not to interrupt her. Instead he looked around: his mum was still slathering over Kevin, Kourtney was texting something on her cell and Kurt was making googly-eyes at Heather. He whistled innocently as he slipped away, giggling mischievously as he ducked into the bathrooms.

“That was easier than I’d thought,” Danny laughed as he scrubbed his hands after taking a quick whizz. He was splashing his face when he heard a husky voice growled, “Pass me a hand towel, kid.” Danny shrugged as he ripped off a section of the roll. He swivelled round to pass it over but froze suddenly as he came to face with a voluptuous woman in a tight red dress that accentuated her gargantuan assets. The woman sighed as Danny stood agape. “Kid, you’re starting to get on my nerves,” they grumbled as they snatched the tissues out of Danny’s grip before moving to the mirror and wiping off their smudged eyeliner. The figure noticed Danny’s stare and promptly snapped, “Stop f*cking staring at me, kid! What are you, gay or something?!”

Danny shook his head vigorously. The ‘man’ snorted disapprovingly as he strutted out in his golden heels. Danny couldn’t help but take one last glance at their plump rump right before the bathroom door slammed shut. He moved back towards the sink and splashed his face again. That was weird, he thought to himself. He wondered why there’d be a woman in the men’s bathrooms but then again he hadn’t really paid attention to the sign above the door when he came in. “Oh well,” he shrugged to himself as he peered out through the crack of the doorframe. When he was reasonably sure that the tour group wasn’t coming back, he flipped his dark hood over his dark hair and made his way back to the lobby.

I’m sure it was this way... After a few minutes of walking, groaning and backtracking, Danny finally retraced his steps back to the reception area. He placed his elbows on the desk and a dorky blonde with a turquoise button on her white lapel smiled at him. “Hi there little one, welcome to Isla de Lockheed Holiday and Resort, the most sought after exclusive holiday experience known to man! My name is Minnie, how may I be of service?” Danny was slightly irked by the fact she called him ‘little one’ but chose to let it slide this time. “Erm, room for Daniel, Daniel Bronson?”

Minnie adjusted her glasses as she typed in some information into the system. She continued to type as she said, “You’re a bit early, Daniel. Normally the grounds tour takes at least an hour and a half...” Danny scratched his head nervously. “Erm,” he squeaked, “I just wanted- I mean, I was so excited to see the room, and my mum, she gave me permission to come back and check out how you guys sorted out our bags and stuff.”

“Are you sure about that, Daniel?” Now her gaze was firmly fixated on Danny himself. A head of sweat ran down his forehead. There was something unsettling about the way she looked at him- her stormy blue eyes roamed his body, analysing, observing him like a butcher does to an animal before choosing the desired cuts they want after the slaughter. Danny breathed a sigh of relief as her expression relaxed. The look only lasted a few seconds but it felt like an eternity in Danny’s mind. He shook his head as Minnie tapped one final key on her keyboard. “Done!” She passed him a turquoise key with an accompanying keycard on its loop. Danny had already turned to go when she told him, “Enjoy your stay Mr Bronson!”

A thought popped into Danny’s mind. He moved back to the counter and awkwardly leaned closer to Minnie’s ear. “Erm, sorry to disturb you again,” he said awkwardly. Minnie cupped her ear as Danny whispered,“This is gonna sound crazy but have you noticed anything...strange while you’ve worked here?” The edge of Minnie’s mouth slightly creased upwards. “Weird like what?,” she replied quietly.

“Erm, you know... Anything like an, erm, woman with a man’s voice?”

Minnie tried to stifle her giggles. “Erm, not that I know of...” Danny rolled his eyes. “You know what- forget I said anything,” he said as he turned and tossed his key into the air. Minnie watched silently as he went round the corner. Her face darkened suddenly and she deftly turned the stapler placed in front of her. A muffled pop noise sounded as a small circular speaker of diameter 5cm turned on from underneath the stapler’s previous position. She lifted the phone to her ear and mimed being on a call as she mumbled, “Subject 5.24 has seen something.”

Lockheed, from his underground laboratory, grinned sinisterly. He surveyed the wide array of surveillance footage stretched over the expands of the rear wall and nodded his head as he watched Danny walking on his way to his assigned room. Lockheed pressed an intercom button on the side of his chair and asked, “What’s the nature of what he’s seen?”

“He said it was a ‘woman with a man’s voice’. Relatively vague so I can’t exactly pinpoint which of our previous guests he could possibly be referring to.”

Lockheed smiled. “Please Minnie,” he explained, “Only use the instant transmission if there’s a serious problem that would actually affect the project. This is barely worth my time- he’ll probably take it as smoker’s voice or whatnot and think it was all part of his imagination by tomorrow morning. In the meantime keep your eyes peeled. The tour will be over soon and I need you to select our first test subjects from this newest pool.” Minnie modded solemnly as she placed the phone down and reset the stapler. She adjusted her blonde bob in the reflection of the entrance’s sliding glass doors before innocently smiling at a newlywed couple walking past. ‘Bide your time, Minnie,’ she thought to herself, ‘Bide your time.’
15513111.title: A tour of the facility

choices: A family of 4: dad, mum, son, daughter
1551312.content:
Reginald Lockheed surveyed the different people milling in and around the entrance to the hotel from a curving balcony above them, scanning their forms and demeanours as they entered the welcoming lobby area. The crowd of people was exceptionally varied, something that Lockheed quietly noted, consisting of people from all walks of life, rich, poor, old, young. Lockheed was especially delighted that there were not only families trying to escape their mundane suburban lifestyles, but single bachelors and bachelorettes coming to have some ’fun in the sun’.

He grinned to himself; he knew that purchasing and industrialising this tropical isle into a holiday resort had been fraught with risks. It was no simple task garnering support and backing from his board of investors, especially that cow, Sharon McGee. “It was all worth it in the end,” he cackled to himself. For Dr Lockheed had secret plans for this resort, plans to use it to ‘experiment’ with new transformation technology and the visitors there as unwitting lab rats.

He cackled maniacally again as he watched the next set of people to check in. As they collected their room keys, Reginald twirled his cane in his wrinkled hands, smiling a devilish smirk as he cooked up different scenarios of them being swapped around. The people in question were:
1551312.title: Focus on another group staying at IDL

choices: Drake takes his leave for now.
The teens enter the main building.
15513122.content:
"Wow, this place is nice." Kristen (age 18) smiled as she stood admiring the outer facade of the tropical hotel they'd be staying at for the next two weeks. Of course she had no idea of the resort's true purpose, and neither did her three friends, Monica, Tyler and Darren. The group of college friends had decided to take a holiday together, and had been pleasantly surprised when invitations to the isle turned up in the post.

"I'm surprised we made it here in one piece on that plane." Darren grumbled, having a fear of flying. There had been a surprising amount of turbulence as they entered the area of the Bermuda Triangle, but they had survived.

His friend Tyler nudged him in the ribs. "You didn't expect us to vanish into thin air did you?" He joked.

"Well, this is the Triangle dude." Darren responded.

"Stop talking shit and enjoy the scenery guys." Monica chimed up, joining Kristen in admiring the resort's beauty. And it was indeed a beautiful place. Some othernewly arrived guests were in the vicinity, and the teens knew there'd be more inside, alongside the resort staff.

Kristen was a white, 5'5" tall blonde, fairly attractive and had a good figure, including a pair of C-cup breasts. Her friend Monica was the sexier of the two though, also white, 5'7", dark hair in a ponytail, she was a stunner, with a nice ass and D-cup breasts. Monica however also had a rather brash attitude and didn't like taking shit from people. Monica had met Kristen while helping her in a fight against two other college girls. And now they were best friends.

Tyler and Darren on the other hand, while they met at the same college (of course), had actually become friends while playing online video games. Tyler was white and was the taller of the two at 6'1" and he was somewhat athletic in appearance. Darren was black, 5'10" tall and less athletic, being less into sports than his friend was. Tyler had been on a number of sports teams back in high school, hence his fitness.

"More new arrivals, great." A voice suddenly said, getting the teens' attention. They turned to see a muscular, tanned guy in shorts and flip flops, he was the resort's life guard, Drake Adderley.

"Ooh, hello.." Monica purred quietly, so only Kristen could hear her.

"Behave yourself, you just got here." Kristen giggled just as quietly. But even Kristen found herself staring for a moment at the large bulge in the man's shorts. After introductions were made, the girls knew the sexy man's name was Drake, which actually suited him a lot, they thought. Even Monica was a little bashful as she shook the man's hand, enjoying his grip.

Drake then took the four college kids on a brief tour of the outside of the resort, including the swimming pool, for those who didn't want to dip in sea water.

Needless to say, everyone was impressed. But Kristen and Monica were definitely more impressed with Drake than with anything else right now.

THUNK! The device bounced off the ground as Black and White looked down in horror. "Oh god, oh god, oh god..." Black squealed, scrambling onto all fours to pick up the remote. Quickly scanning the exterior of the device, Black assessed that there had been no lasting damage to the remote, breathing a sigh of relief. "That was a close one, wasn't it," Black laughed awkwardly, looking at the cold expression of Agent White.

He looked stern and unforgiving as he said, "This is why we don't play with the boss's toys- you always end up breaking them." He placed his manicured hands onto his hips, looking like a schoolteacher scolding one of their students. "Give it here." Black reluctantly handed the device to White who carefully placed it into his bra for safekeeping. White then rearranged his package inside of his panties, wondering why he hadn't just thought to buy some boxers.

"Come on- we've still got to deliver this to the boss." He turned around and strutted effortlessly, his large red heels clacking on the pavement as he swayed his large butt that strained the seams of his black slacks. He whipped off his black tie as it was choking him due to his large rack tightening his pristine white dress shirt.

Black sulkily stood up, his giant tits jiggling as he did so. 'Why'd I even enlarge 'em this much?,' he silently wondered. He flicked his platinum blonde locks out of his face as he tried to run after his partner (which proved difficult in his 4 inch stilettos). He was dressed similarly to Agent White except from the fact that he had unbuttoned his top buttons to 'let his puppies breathe' and that he wore a short black pencil skirt instead of slacks.

Both approached a dark Mercedes with blacked out windows. They hopped in, White driving with Black sitting in shotgun. White took a moment to check the mirrors and check his frizzy hair and Black took out a mirror and some lipstick, reapplying red lipstick on his buxom lips. "Okay- back to base!" White smiled as he placed his petite foot on the accelerator and they roared off, not paying any attention to the large men on a street corner trying to pose sexily in their slutty outfits.
1552111.title: Black and White get a few changes

1553.title: Something else

15531.content:
The cameras flashed brightly, their dazzling sparkles reflected back by the pearly white teeth of Dr Reginald Lockheed. Although his skin sagged slightly with large wrinkles exposing his real age, the man radiated youth with his upbeat and slightly hyperactive demeanour. He wore a plain black suit with matching shoes along with a blood-red turtleneck which complimented his whole 'I'm-richer-than-you', egocentric persona.

"Yes, yes," he started as he calmed down the crowd of paparazzi that clamoured around him. "... An extraterrestrial meteorite DID crashland outside of Transforming Genetics Headquarters yesterday afternoon. I have taken many steps in order to safeguard, not only me and my employees at TG, but you also, the people, should feel SAFE knowing that me and my staff will contain this situation quickly AND safely. Thank you."

He ambled away from the pedestal, one hand waving at the adoring crowd and the other tightly gripping an antique cane that had elaborate, shadowy designs carved into the top. As he came off stage the reporters and cameramen swarmed Dr Lockheed but were quickly dispersed by a tall woman with a long, hooked beak that shooed them away.

"Give him some space! For God's sake, he's an ELDERLY MAN!" she yelled , speaking in a nasally voice that sounded like she had a permanent cold. She turned as she escorted Dr Lockheed through the opening of two large doors before slamming them behind her, the CLICK! of the magnificent locks activating behind them.

They had walked inside a large chamber that was filled with expensive artworks, reclinable chairs made of red velvet. The room all seemed to point towards a large desk at the back which had a large, elegant chair (more like a throne than a chair, really) and a polished mahogany table that was shaped beautifully. Dr Lockheed's lively and animated farce quickly dissolved as he slithered into his seat. pulled out some hand sanitizer and rubbed her hands together frantically before she proceeded to talk.

"Well, I've never seen members of the press be so PATHETIC before! I understand you want that you want your big scoop and all but JEEZ LOUISE, do you have to be so ANNOYING about it!" She straightened the sleeves of her grey (yes, grey) blazer and then picked off some king from her matching skirt.

Dr Lockheed sighed, as if he'd had to tell his point multiple times over in the past. "To be honest, they have a RIGHT to know what the hell's going on," he said slightly dejectedly, "If our roles were reversed right now would YOU be happy to sit still, be quiet, say nothing, even though ANYTHING, and I mean ANYTHING, could have crashed landed in your back garden to wreak havoc on the world?"

Rebecca Gray thought about his question and sat down to consider her next words. "Sigh. All I'm trying to say is maybe they're asking for too much; how are we supposed to understand what the hell we're dealing with when we've NEVER seen anything like it?"

Reginald Lockheed scratched the small tuft of hair on his chin as he processed this. He shrugged his shoulders melancholically as he rose from his seat then pressed a small red, button on the side. The room shuddered as an electronic voice that was neither male nor female announced, "WARNING: ROOM DESCENDING- GOING TO... LAB, LEVEL 1."

The room began to rapidly descend, causing papers on the desk to zoom upwards into what now appeared to be a long elevator shaft. Although they were both plummeting downwards rapidly, neither seemed fazed by it, Lockheed waiting patiently while Miss Gray just yawned.
- --- - -- --- --- --- -- --- --- ---- ----

"...got to fix that hyper-lift, Sir..." Rebecca said as she attempted to straighten the neat bun atop her head. "My hairdresser is starting to get suspicious whenever she sees my bun ruined- it's annoying trying to think of an excuse."

Lockheed made a noise, a strange one that could either be a momentary laugh, a disgruntled groan, or even both. He walked through the room, navigating past dozens of tables and workstations filled with unfinished designs and vials full of weirdly coloured solutions. He seemed to find the person he wanted, tapping on their back with his cane.

"What do you want..." She turned round and was so startled to see her boss that she stumbled, knocking over a set of vials that shattered when they collided with the floor. She looked down at the wreckage then back up, giving an irresistibly cute smile that made it impossible to get angry at her. She was short-ish at 5'2" but she seemed to get even shorter still as she squirmed in place.

"Sorry, Professor Lockheed... I mean, Dr Lockheed... I mean, Hi." Rachel looked down at the broken shards of glass that littered the lab floor, wishing she could go back and restart their meeting. "Umm, sorry sir, I was just a bit..."

"Surprised?"

"Yeah, surprised. You don't really come down to the lab that often and you just... caught me off guard."

"Don't worry, Miss Cartwright, I don't plan on making many more 'surprise' visits any time soon, I just wanted to see what one of my most talented scientists have to say about 'The Rock'."

"Well," she replied, "I've got..."
15531.title: A Weird Day At The Office

155331.content: What group are we following in this arc?
155331.title: Let's start here...

info.brief_description: Someone is given the power to steal or swap traits from whoever they want to- have fun!
info.description:
pee234 is the original creator of this story.

This is basically a story that is about someone using (mostly abusing) their power to steal traits from other people. You can be very loose and I'm only adding two rules:

•Don’t get TOO graphic
•Have fun!

Now that's out of the way, let's get onto some characters:

Daniel 'Danny' Bronson: He will be the main protagonist in the story. He's Caucasian with bright green eyes and short, messy black hair. He's 15 years old and stands at 5"10- 5"11-ish. He's quite clever but he gets bored easily and likes to act out a lot. He's got two best friends, Rick and Gazza, who he hangs out with in and outside of his school and has a small crush on his neighbors, the Clarks, daughter Dawn. His favourite sibling is his older sister Megan who is also known to have a rebellious streak.

Megan 'Megs' Bronson: Our second main protagonist is 22 years old. She has dull green eyes and is a bit of a punk, having a black fauxhawk that'd been died from its original brown colour and a lot of piercings: many in her ears, one in her eyebrow, one in her naval and a small nose piercing. She inherited her height from her mother standing at a small 5"5 but did not seem to inherit her body, with small B cup boobs and a small butt. She normally wears very tight leggings and Doc Martens and a leather jacket over a random punk band's T-shirt. She used to go to college but dropped out to join a punk rock band called the Punkopaths as their lead singer and guitarist with her mates Lindsay and Kelly. Although she has had many boyfriends, Megan doesn't mind 'experimenting' every once in a while.

Gabrielle 'Gabby' Bronson-Carter: Danny and Megan's 37 year old mother and the third main protagonist. Although she had Megan first at only 15 years old, she had a fling with a visiting US Army soldier (Danny's stepdad Kevin), resulting in Danny's older brother Kurt. She went back to Megan's father and subsequently giving birth to Danny but, after a bitter divorce with her ex-husband Barry, she married Curt's father and gave birth to Danny's younger sister Kourtney. She is very calm and reserved, except for when she's either scolding Danny and Megan or arguing with her ex Barry. She works as a secretary for a secret government agency devoted to creating ways to change the human anatomy- through 'exotic' means. Has best friend, Diann Dickson, who also works at TG. She stands at a petite 5"4 but has large D cup breasts that hadn't started to sag yet and a large butt. She has pale blue eyes and brunette hair that is normally kept in a bun or a ponytail and she doesn't wear a lot of makeup. She also (not so) secretly has a favourite child in Kourtney.

Other characters:

Commander Kevin Carter: Husband to Gabrielle Bronson-Carter, father of Kurt and Kourtney Carter and stepfather of Daniel and Megan Branson. A decorated US Army soldier, Kevin was shipped out to see a secret British company that were working on developing better soldiers (Transformation Group). There he met Gabrielle and they bore Kurt. He shipped back out to America soon after but following a surprise ambush by a militant group, Kevin's knee was severely damaged and he had to retire from the Army. He then returned to the UK where he reunited with Danny's mum and married her. He is 6"5 and built like a tank with giant rippling muscles. He always wears his dog tags round his neck and is always seen wearing a tank top and camouflage bottoms.Kevin has a short, blonde army crewcut and pale blue eyes. Works part time for Transforming Genetics as security. His biological children adore him but Danny and Megan are very withdrawn and hostile towards him.

Kurt Carter: Standing at 6"2 and with an intimidating physique at 19 years of age, Kurt is basically a younger version of his father, albeit his brown hair. Although he is a swot and a know-it-all, Kurt can be very funny and approachable. He is fiercely loyal to his family and won't let people disrespect them, making him Danny's second favourite sibling. Kurt excels in sports like rugby, basketball, football(soccer) and athletics. He idolises his father and always seeks to impress him. He is hoping either to become a pro athlete or lawyer when he's older.

Kourtney Carter: Kurt's sister. Although she is only 14, Kourtney is 5"8 and still growing, with large C cup boobs and a large round ass (which she teases her 'big' sister Megan about). She has long, luscious blonde hair and piercing blue eyes, making her one of the most popular and sought after girls in her and Danny's high school. She is intelligent like her brother making her adored by teachers and students alike. Her only downfall is that she knows this and this makes her aggravatingly arrogant and cocky. She struts around school with her twin lackeys Kay and Kellie.

Dawn Clark: Danny's not-so-secret crush. She is in the year above Danny and is built like a model, slender with large boobs and wide hips. She's black and is from Australia, giving her a cute accent that charms all the boys. She is 5"9 with a pretty face and small black pom-poms on her head. Although they'd lived next to each other for over a decade, Danny had never picked up the nerve to talk to her, resolving to just admire her from a distance.

The Clarks: Ruby and Michael Clark are very friendly neighbors. Michael is thin like a twig while and Ruby is quite voluptuous and curvy. Neither is above the age of 35.

Barry Henderson: Danny and Megan's biological father. He is 6"1 and slightly overweight. He always wears sunglasses over his green eyes and a biker's bandana over his black mop of hair and wears a leather jacket, jeans and boots to go with his biker look. He also rides around on his authentic Harley Davidson motorbike. He is the unofficial manager for Megan's band the Punkopaths and is also in his own rock band the Ruff' Riders. He can do no wrong in the eyes of Megan and Danny, which annoys their mother to no end. He is on bad relations with Gabrielle and whatever conversation they have always spirals into a heated argument.

Rick Thompson and Garry 'Gazza' Bennett: Danny's best mates. All inseparable as they have been mates since they were born. Rick is white, short and quite tubby but is braver- or stupider- than anyone Danny knew, refusing to back down to anyone about anything. Gazza is the opposite; he is black, tall and lanky and did pretty well in pretty much everything. He can be quite loquacious and won't stop talking until you force him to. His only weakness is girls- he freezes up everytime one tries to speak to him. He also gets mercilessly taunted about his MILF mum's involvement in an adult movie Danny had found, Carol (or Cassie as she was called in the film) has giant, surgically enhanced breasts and buttocks which she always flaunts in tight, curve hugging dresses.

Jenny Thompson: single mother of Rick Thompson. Has 7 kids: Richard, 23, Layla, 21, Brittney, 17, Rick, 15, Freddie, 10, Imogen, 8, and Rose, 5. Works at Transformation Group with Gabby and Diann as a cytologist (study of cells). Can be a very funny and sociable person but can get extreme mood swings due to pregnancy.

Lindsay Garrett and Kelly Wong: Megan's best friends and band mates, they make the other 2/3 of Punkopaths. They are both the same age as Megan. Lindsay's parents are wealthy real estate agents and she lives in a large apartment that her parents paid for her and that all the girls shared. Her parents don't really care what Lindsay does, as long as she enjoys herself. Kelly on the other hand, is seen as a disappointment to her parents. They were intelligent computer programmers who came from a strict Chinese background and both expected her to follow in their footsteps. When she told her parents she'd dropped out of school to join a rock band with her friends her mother and father broke down in tears. To add insult to injury, she came out as bisexual to her parents and they kicked her out of her house. Kelly wears heavy black makeup and has large, unkempt black hair. She's 5"7 with C cup boobs and wears a black bobble hat, jumper with a skull on it and hooped black leggings leading to large brown army boots. She plays bass guitar. Lindsay is very bubbly and kind, joining the band just for a good time. She's tall at 5"11 and has braided blonde hair. She has hypnotic hazel eyes that are hard not to lose yourself inside. She's very self conscious, wearing baggy jeans and jackets to try and cover up her DD cup boobs and big bum. She's the drummer or the band.

Kay and Kellie Dickson: twins that hang out with Kourtney wherever she goes. They are completely identical: both are 14, both are black, both are 5"6, both have shoulder length hair that's frizzy and brushed over one side of their face and both have the same voice. It's nearly impossible to tell them apart as they even behave identically. Although they are not as pretty as Kourtney, both attract their fair share of boys, specifically Gazza who's awkwardness around girls stopped him from asking one out.

Diann Dickson: Kay and Kellie's mother. She's about 5'7" and has large E cup boobs. A former cheerleader in high school, she is always trying to keep in peak physical condition with toned muscles and abs. Gabrielle Bronson-Carter's best friend and colleague at Transformation Group.

Reggie Dickson: Kay and Kellie's father. Former convict. Is 6"2 and muscular. Shaved head and has loads of tattoos. Spends time smoking something or gambling away money. Not liked by neither Kay nor Kellie.

Reginald Lockheed: founder and head scientist of secret company Transformation Group. He's bald with a grey, wispy beard. He is 6'1" and 67 years of age, requires a cane to get around his workplace. He is of the mad variety of scientists and he has devoted his life to developing a way to get young again (possibly by stealing over's youth, perhaps?). Dislikes Ms McGee as he wants to carry on his research in secret instead of turning TG to a cosmetic company.

Magnus Kronenburg: 23 year old genetecist at Transformation Group. 5'8"- wears large round spectacles. Has neatly combed blonde hair and prefers to wear a tie and shirt opposed to casual clothes. A genius but is very shy, especially around Diann, who many male workers have a crush on. His only real friend is new colleague, Nabila, who he harbours some feelings for.

Trent Lockheed: 25 years old, 6'3", very handsome with rugged blonde hair. No genius by any standards but he can be clever at times. Very vain and pompous, only has a job because his dad owns department. Sexist and rude.

Ricardo Perez: 58 year old Mexican man working as a janitor at Transformation Group. Short at 5'5" and is always seen with baggy blue overalls, low rimmed blue cap and a large, bushy greying moustache. He is very lazy and can normally be seen either reading a newspaper, sleeping or just walking around aimlessly.

Sharon McGee: the owner and funder of Transformation Group. Although she is 42 years of age, she likes to pretend she's younger by wearing skimpy and outgoing clothes with lots of makeup. Has had lots of cosmetic surgery, enlarging her breasts to a H cup and making her butt very large. Black haired with blue eyes. She wants Dr Lockheed to provide a way for her to become young again and also wants to make TG into a public cosmetic company.

Riley Ripling: Front desk operator. Is only about 19 and very much acts her age. About 5'3" with B cup boobs. Wears her brunette hair into a long ponytail and wears stylish circle-rimmed glasses. Can come across very uncaring and rude but it's because she has a very laid back and nonchalant personality. Normally when she's bored she'll whip out her phone and text her boyfriend Finn.

Jake and Jenny Duckhold: inseparable brother-sister duo. Both have red hair, green eyes and casual specs. Jake is an engineer while Jenny is an analytical chemist, allowing them to work in synch and in perfect harmony together. Jake is handsome in a geeky way and stands at 5'11" while Jenny is quite cute standing at 5'6" with pert C cup breasts. Both are 22 years old and are very intelligent, both graduating at 15 years old. Megan Bronson has a secret infatuation with Jake while Jenny has a not-so-secret crush on Kurt Carter.

Rebecca Gray: R&D supervisor. Stands at 5'8" normally but is elevated to 6'1" with her signature black stilettos. Has raven black hair done in a pristine bun and dark chocolate coloured eyes. She has a long pointed nose and always wears a permanent scowl with a high pitched nasally voice. Dressed always for business. Doesn't understand the actual science but believes that when they look like they're working it normally means productivity.

Professor Richie Kendrick: 45 year old palaeontologist (specialises in fossils). 5’11” African American man. Although he is not at the young age that most of his colleagues are, he's very sociable and gets on with everyone. Has small square spectacles and has a shiny, bald head. Outside of work he has a family of 5 with his wife Yolanda and kids Craig, Harry and Brenda.

Tim Lao: 27 year old bioengineer. He comes from China and, while he speaks near perfect English, has a very strong Chinese accent. Measures at 6'0" and has a bowl cut with large specs. Very smart but can be very naive as he doesn't know the local customs.

Rosalinda 'Rosa' Marchesi: 34 year old physicist that originally came from the Italian branch of Transforming Genetics. A MILF that keeps in peak physical condition despite having 2 kids with her boyfriend Fernando. Is 5'7" with plump C-cup boobs and a toned ass but she tries to hide her assets in plain clothes and baggy labcoat. Can be controlling at times but she always realises when she's piling it on too much and stops, making her very popular with her coworkers. Has long brunette hair with blonde highlights and has stylish Armani glasses.

Rachel Cartwright: 24 years of age and has bright ginger hair and piercing green eyes. She's even shorter than Gabrielle standing at 5'2". Is a bit of a tomboy, wears no makeup (except for special occasions) and chooses to wear baggy hoodies and jeans with beaten up trainers. Wouldn't admit it but she has a not so secret crush on Trent Lockheed, making her one of the few people that can actually stand him. Works at TG for PR and is very social and approachable.

Aamil Abdi: New 26 year old engineer at Transforming Genetics, formerly from Somalia. He has milk chocolate coloured skin with dark waves in his hair. Standing at about 5’9”, Aamil can be very intimidating despite his limp physique. He can be very hot headed and confrontational, sharing a mutual dislike with Trent Lockheed. Lives with his 65 year old parents and younger sister, Azhar.

Nabila Hussain: New 23 year old geneticist at TG. She’s 5’5” and slightly more voluptuous than her coworkers. She’s a Pakistani Muslim and wears a hijab everywhere she goes. Nabila has a very persistent personality, determined to make a name for herself at her new workplace. She has a good relationship with Magnus Kronenburg as they had studied together previously. She has some feelings for him but Is waiting for him to make the first move.

Emily (Emmy) Thompson: bubbly new physicist at TG. 23 year old Caucasian and 5’4 with C cup boobs. Very hyperactive and erratic, Emmy is a bright young woman that many times talks more than she really should. She speaks with a light but distinct American accent as her father’s from LA but her mother is from London. Has blue eyes and dirty blonde hair that’s either tied into a messy ponytail or left hanging loose. She’s trusting and very social and tries to be friends with everyone.
--- --- ---- --- - -- ----- --

The workers I've added to TG are not the only characters there but the main and most relevant ones. Feel free to add any additional character you feel like! Just remember to have fun! 😁
